header.value: GET, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

response.name: Genre List
response.body:
Page not found (404)

Request Method: GET
Request URL: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/genre-list/

Using the URLconf defined in backend.urls, Django tried these URL patterns, in this order:

  1. admin/
  2. api/ playlists/ [name='playlist-list']
  3. api/ playlists/<int:pk>/ [name='playlist-detail']
  4. api/ songs/ [name='song-list']
  5. api/ songs/<int:pk>/ [name='song-detail']
  6. api/ genres/ [name='genre-list']
  7. api/ genres/<int:pk>/ [name='genre-detail']
  8. api/ liked-playlists/ [name='liked-playlist-list']
  9. api/ like-playlist/<int:pk>/ [name='like-playlist']
  10. api/ unlike-playlist/<int:pk>/ [name='unlike-playlist']
  11. api/ liked-songs/ [name='liked-song-list']
  12. api/ like-song/<int:pk>/ [name='like-song']
  13. api/ unlike-song/<int:pk>/ [name='unlike-song']
  14. api/ artists/ [name='artist-list']
  15. api/ artists/<int:pk>/ [name='artist-detail']
  16. api/ following-artists/ [name='following-artist-list']
  17. api/ follow-artist/<int:pk>/ [name='follow-artist']
  18. api/ unfollow-artist/<int:pk>/ [name='unfollow-artist']
  19. api/ register/ [name='register']
  20. api/ login/ [name='login']
  21. api/ customer-profile/ [name='customer-detail']
  22. api/ customer-image-upload/ [name='customer-image-upload']

The current path, api/genre-list/, didnt match any of these.

Youre seeing this error because you have DEBUG = True in your Django settings file. Change that to False, and Django will display a standard 404 page.
